column5: My sincerest condolences to you and your family.
Sorry for your loss Brian.  My thoughts and condolences are with you and your family.
sorry to here of your loss Brian
My Condolences to all Brian
Sorry to hear this Brian...  Stay strong...
sorry to hear Brian my prayers are with you bud.  Art
My condolences as well Mr. B. Sorry to hear of this happening at any time, but especially this time of year is tough.  Brian
My deepest condolences Brian...Your Aunt K is in a special place now and is at peace!

I would like to thank all those that replied and all those that pm,ed me. I was able to spend my time this morning with her and reflect on so many memories. This morning we layed her to rest and what a BUEATIFUL sunny day to do so,right beside her parents.   Im sorry for the bump,but just wanted to say THANK YOU to everyone.  May you all be blessed and enjoy your holiday season.   til we meet again Aunt K.

Nothing to be sorry about Bud... was a great day.. cold.. but sunny. Reflect on the good times me friend!  Hopefully one day we'll nip this terrible disease in the butt Brian. I'm off to New Liskeard early Monday am for another that fought a courageous battle.
Now you all know why I am proud to call this man my son.
My Sincere Condolences...

I know my next would be fishing or hunting  related but,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,  A while back I told you about a great women that watchd over my grandfather during his last few years  She fed him,clothed him washed him,watched over him. Nothing was ever asked by him,but she gave him all he needed. After his passing, she was alone. She was given the dreadful gift of throutt cancer. Nice eh. Then she  had surgury for this and got infection in the stomach,liver and lower extremityies. After a  couple years of pain and discomfort,she was cancer free .  .She was on her way to finishing her life, living out her life,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,Well today she was not to live no more. She had an accendident at home and she had some serious brain damage .  People like this, that do so good for others,why must they have to pay such a price? God Im sure has his reason,and Im sure my grandfather and grandmother Blowes,are holding her tight right now saying, thank you, and welcome to the house ,where there is no pain ,just love.  There is so much I can say about aunt K. She and I were not to far apart in years. Her friends were mine,she was like a big sister I never had,(well they knew her brother,which was my dad and no one messed with us in the parkdale area)LOL.  With that I say,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,  Thank you for being my aunt,my friend and my buddy way back when I needed one. You,ll be missed.  SOON ENOUGH, LIKE THE REST ,WE,LL BE TOGTHER AND HOLDING EACH OTHER IN THE HOUSE THAT GOD BUILT.  Thanks for everything aunt Kathy.  Til we see again,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,GOD IM GOING TO MISS YOU,
Sorry for your loss, our deepest sympathies, Misfish.
a very nice tribute Brian, my condolences
Ah geez Brian, my condolences man..
misfish, so much of this is happening on a daily bassis, my thoughts go out to you and your family. FLEX - John
Very sorry for your loss Brian. Glad to see you have faith. It really helps to heal the wound in your heart.
my condolences  bud
Sorry for your loss  Brian!  Sinker
sorry for your loss Brian my thoughts are with you

Sorry for your families loss Brian... you know where I stand with this terrible disease.  Sounds like you've got lots of GOOD memories to reflect on... and that's always a great thing at a time like this.  Wayne
So sorry to hear of your loss Brian. Your tribute is truly heartfelt.  John...
That's terrible news Brian.  My sincerest condolances.  Joey
I'm so sorry to hear your news, Brian.  I am sure you feel that your beautiful tribute can't even come close, but I can see her in your words.  God Bless, Brian.

so sorry to hear i know the feeling all to well lately and know that the best feeling is knowing that a group of people like here at OFC are wishing you the best to come and all have condolences for you in this hard time!
I'm so sorry to hear of your loss Brian. What a beautiful tribute!
Very sorry to hear of your family's loss. Her great spirit will live forever in your heart and soul.
....I too am sorry to hear this Brian. My sincerest condolences.
That was a beautiful tribute to your Aunt, Brian.  Our condolences to you and your family on your loss.

Very sorry to hear about this Brian.  I remember the updates you would give from time to time.  Very tragic news...she loved and was well loved and will never be forgotten.  Our thoughts are with you.....  Cliff and Carole
very sorry to hear this news,its always sad to hear a great person has moved on.  my thoughts and prayers are with your family  Hawg Hunter
He takes the good one's first Brian... terrible time of year to have this happen. You have my thoughts this day. HH
My sincerest condolences to you and your family's loss.
Brian, so sorry to hear about this    My deepest condolences to you and your family. Jacques
My sincerest condolances
Thanks everyone. She finally got her wings.
